ABILITY_DAMP: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves such as Explosion and Self-Destruct.
ABILITY_VOLT_ABSORB: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move; grants immunity to Electric-type moves.
ABILITY_FLASH_FIRE: Restores HP if hit by a Fire-type move; grants the Pokémon immunity to Fire-type moves
ABILITY_WATER_ABSORB: Restores HP if hit by a water-type move; grants immunity to Water-type moves.
ABILITY_INTIMIDATE: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat by one stage upon entering battle. One stage = 50% decrease from its base value
ABILITY_WONDER_GUARD: Prevents all damage from moves that are not super effective against the Pokémon.
ABILITY_LEVITATE: Grants immunity to all Ground-type moves and the Arena Trap ability.
ABILITY_THICK_FAT: Halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
ABILITY_TRUANT: The Pokémon only attacks every other turn.
ABILITY_GUTS: Boosts the Attack stat by 50% when the Pokémon has a status condition.
